node.title: SAG Award Nominations 2022: What to Watch for
node.alt: A Screen Actors Guild statue from 2018. The nominations are being announced today.
node.description: The actorsâ€™ group will be unveiling its list amid a Covid-affected Oscar season.
node.content: ["With the Critics\u2019 Choice Awards postponed and the Golden Globes reduced to a social media event, will the Screen Actors Guild Awards pump life into this quiet awards season?", "The answer will start to become apparent when the nominations are unveiled this morning. These are the prizes handed out by Hollywood actors\u2019 guild SAG-AFTRA, and they have some predictive value for the Oscars because actors also make up the largest branch of the academy.", "Keep an eye on \u201cThe Power of the Dog\u201d and \u201cWest Side Story,\u201d which made headway at the Globes and could be in the running for outstanding cast, the SAGs\u2019 equivalent of best picture. Winners in this SAG category often but not always go on to take the academy\u2019s top prize as well. Other Globes winners who might be nominated today by their peers include Will Smith (\u201cKing Richard\u201d) and Nicole Kidman (\u201cBeing the Ricardos\u201d).", "Rosario Dawson and Vanessa Hudgens will be announcing the nominations at 10 a.m. Eastern, 7 a.m. Pacific time. You can watch on Instagram Live.", "Check back here for the complete list of nominations."]
